0.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0600 hours on 9 November 2016. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

comments.message: Hi all! We'd like to share that only an Upsized Extra Value Meal, which consists of a Large Fries and Medium Drink, entitles customers to 2 Game Labels. Upgrading the Fries to Twister Fries will not entitle you to 2 Game Labels as Twister Fries only comes in one size. The entitlement of 2 Game Labels also does not apply when you swap the side for salad or corn. We hope this helps to clarify!

Hi there, only those who have received a Chance Card game piece can register the code number for Chace Card Weekly Draw (and Final Prize Draw for any unclaimed Collect to Win prizes). Collect To Win or Instant Win game pieces are not eligible for registration. Do make sure you are registering a valid Chance Card code number. 

If you are unable to register a valid Chance Card code number, it may be due to the configuration of your machine/device which affects the browser behaviour. Please try to register the Chance Card code number on a different machine and/or different browser if necessary. If you're still not able to register, please provide the following information via a PM for our investigation and we will get back to you as soon as possible. 
-          Photo of the Chance Card game piece
-          Screen capture of the registration error
-          Browser and browser version
-          OS version

Thank you!

Unacceptable mcdelivery.  Called at 1.45am for. Time for delivery was 2.55 am. Waited till 2.50am, the track my order show order received . Gave mcdelivery a call they say will ask restaurant manager to call. As of this post , no one called and made us wait for nothing..if I did not make the call at 2.50am. My credit card will have been deducted but no food delivery.😡😡

Service? Macdonald? 

I paid for my delivery and I have to chase for my delivery? ???up till now no formal explanation or sincere apology from Mac.

Totally disappointed!

Had my lunch at People's Park Complex Mcdonald's & I ordered McChicken Burger Value Meal

Knowing that I can get 2 game labels if I upsize my value meal, I had upsized my meal to Medium Size Green Tea and changed my fries to curly fries. 

To my dismay, I was given only one game label. And the reason given by your manager, Leng Yong, was that I had changed the normal fries to curly fries, hence they can only gave me one game label. 

This is absolutely ridiculous and unfair to the customers. 
There isn't any terms and conditions that says that if the customer changes their fries to something else, they are only entitled to one game label.  

Could you kindly clarify? — at ￼McDonald's People's Park

I was of the impression that I would be entitled to 2 game labels if I upsize an extra value meal. 

Earlier this afternoon I ordered an extra value meal and upsized it. On top of that, I upgraded my fries to the promotional 'lucky twist fries'. 

I was informed by the cashier as well as the floor manager that I was only entitled to 1 label, despite the fact that I have upsized my meal. 

According to them this is because the system, which automatically calculates how many labels to issue based on the customer's purchase.

I think it is unfair for your system to penalize customers for purchasing additional items on top of the stipulated minimum requirements. I hope the game committee will look into this issue.

A lot of ppl has commented on upsizing meal and changing fries to curly fries and only getting one coupon. But macdonalds doesn't seem to be addressing this. it's not in the terms and condition. I feel that if my receipt shows upsize we should be entitled to 2 coupons! It's not our fault that macdonalds doesn't have L for curly fries if there was I would gladly pay for it. 

Many has brought up this issue but macs is just keeping quiet...totally disappointed

i ordered takeaway of chicken set meal. when i reach home, i found out there isn't any game label as I'm entitled to. i have checked my receipt. this is 2nd time i didn't receive. please get your staff standardised it!

the new system of ordering and waiting for food during heavy traffic DOES NOT WORK. 

Your customer service reps and counter people have to deal with recurring issues amongst the mosh of people, when the old system would deal with one set of customers and be done with them.

What a mess especially when the manager himself is so disorganized, holding all the tickets in one hand and not delegating out the tasks or orders. 

Absentee customer orders plaque the counter top congesting the small pick up area. Orders flow through far to fast. Kitchen seems to be putting out food fast enough, but counter staff and servers are way to disorganized, answering far too many incorrect orders, multi-tasking and fielding endless questions and complaints.
I have a missing egg and a semi cooked egg this morning.

Hi

I would like to give a feedback on the cupcorn. I ate it a few times and realized that the cup which the corn is served is made of plastic, and it poses a health concern esp when hot corn is poured inside the PLASTIC cup. In fact, there was once I felt that the cup turned soft when the contents inside was piping hot, implying that it may actually be melting (?) or contracting, and it is a pretty scary thing if we consider the possibility that toxic chemicals from the plastic might seep into the corn due to the heat, and this is seriously a health concern that must be brought up to your attention. Do consider using other materials to contain hot food items, such as styrofoam (you all use styrofoam cups to contain hot tea and coffee, isn't it? Why can't the same be done for cup corn). Either that or you don't serve the corn hot - serve it cold instead. In short, plastic with hot food is a no-go. Worse come to worse, I would rather McDonalds remove this food item from its menu entirely.

Do keep me updated on the outcome, or I may consider escalating it to the relevant food health authorities/AVA. It is a serious health violation.God knows how many people have been put at risk with such toxic procedures.

paid for cereal and yes u can count those cereal with both hands. the patty is overcooked. macdonald we all know your hit-n-go marketing strategy but do it so that customer won't feel ripped off at least.

QW-27/09/2016-91

I would like to complain about the long delay which I've experienced on my delivery order tonight. I've placed my order with you around 8pm for an advance order to be sent to my residential address at 10.15pm. I waited until 10.40pm and my order was still not delivered. Then I called up the MacDonald hotline to enquire. The contact centre staff told me that the restaurant will get in touch with me shortly to update me on the status of my order. Another 15 mins went by and there was still no news. So I rang the hotline again to inform them that I would like to cancel my order and instead of showing me any empathy, the contact centre staff asked if I've made payment via credit card. If so, it takes up to 14 days for the refund. First, I did not cancel this order out of my own accord. The order was not fulfilled by MacDonald to me as a consumer and so, I sought to cancel. I do not see why I still have to wait for 14 days for my monies to be refunded to me. This is simply not the right way to do business, not at all. It is a service lapse on MacDonald's part and I presume I've the right to be compensated and proper service recovery to be carried out. FYI: I ended up with no dinner tonight after a late night at work. All thanks to you, MacDonalds.

Regards,
Charlene Chen
